      "id": "flight-bookings",

      "title": "Flight Bookings",
      "description": "Best prices on domestic and international flights with instant confirmation",
      "long_description": "Book flights to 200+ destinations worldwide. We offer competitive pricing, quick confirmations, and 24/7 customer support for all your flight needs.",
      "features": ["Competitive pricing on domestic flights", "International flight bookings", "Instant confirmation via email/SMS", "Flexible date changes", "Travel insurance add-on available"],
      "benefits": ["Save up to 40% on airline tickets", "Zero hidden charges", "Free cancellation up to 7 days before", "Priority customer support"],
      "link_label": "Learn More",
      "link_href": "/details/",
      "meta_keywords": "flight booking, airlines, tickets, travel"
    },
    {
      "id": "hotel-stays",
      "icon": "üè®",
      "title": "Hotels & Stays",
      "description": "Comfortable accommodations and resorts worldwide",
      "long_description": "Choose from luxury 5-star resorts to budget-friendly hotels. We've partnered with over 50,000 properties globally to ensure best rates.",
      "features": ["3-5 star hotels in major cities", "Budget and luxury options", "Resorts and home stays", "Group accommodation discounts", "Last-minute deals available"],
      "benefits": ["Best price guarantee", "Free cancellation on most bookings", "Exclusive member discounts", "24/7 hotel support"],
      "link_label": "Learn More",
      "link_href": "/details/",
      "meta_keywords": "hotels, accommodations, resorts, stay"
    },
    {
      "id": "tour-packages",
      "icon": "üó∫Ô∏è",
      "title": "Tour Packages",
      "description": "Customized tours for every budget and preference",
      "long_description": "From budget backpacking to luxury tours, we design personalized itineraries for individual travelers, families, and groups.",
      "features": ["Pre-planned tour packages", "Fully customizable itineraries", "Group tour discounts", "Adventure and leisure packages", "Family-friendly options"],
      "benefits": ["All-inclusive package pricing", "Expert local guides", "Hassle-free planning", "Flexible dates and extensions"],
      "link_label": "Learn More",
      "link_href": "/details/",
      "meta_keywords": "tour packages, holidays, travel, itinerary"
    },
    {
      "id": "visa-assistance",
      "icon": "üìã",
      "title": "Visa Assistance",
      "description": "Expert visa support and documentation for 50+ countries",
      "long_description": "Get expert guidance on visa requirements, documentation, and application processes for major travel destinations.",
      "features": ["Visa consultations for 50+ countries", "Complete documentation support", "Embassy liaison services", "Fast-track processing available", "Multi-year visa assistance"],
      "benefits": ["98% visa approval rate", "Free consultation", "Expert documentation review", "Embassy connections"],
      "link_label": "Learn More",
      "link_href": "/details/",
      "meta_keywords": "visa, passport, travel permit, documentation"
    },
    {
      "id": "cab-rentals",
      "icon": "üöó",
      "title": "Cab & Transport",
      "description": "Reliable ground transportation across India and abroad",
      "long_description": "Premium cab rental services with experienced drivers for city tours, intercity travel, and airport transfers.",
      "features": ["Airport transfers", "City sightseeing tours", "Intercity cab services", "Multiple vehicle categories", "Professional drivers"],
      "benefits": ["Best rental prices", "Experienced drivers", "Real-time GPS tracking", "24/7 roadside assistance"],
      "link_label": "Learn More",
      "link_href": "/details/",
      "meta_keywords": "cab rental, transport, vehicle, driver"
    },
    {
      "id": "holiday-packages",
      "icon": "üéâ",
      "title": "Holiday Packages",
      "description": "Special packages for festivals, New Year, and holidays",
      "long_description": "Celebrate special occasions with our curated holiday packages including accommodations, meals, and activities.",
      "features": ["Diwali special packages", "New Year celebrations", "Christmas holiday bundles", "Wedding destination services", "Corporate team outings"],
      "benefits": ["Up to 30% savings on holiday deals", "Group discounts available", "Custom celebration arrangements", "All-inclusive pricing"],
      "link_label": "Learn More",
      "link_href": "/details/",
      "meta_keywords": "holiday packages, festivals, celebrations, special offers"
    }
  ]
}
